owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository without the `.git` extension. The name is not case sensitive.

state.description: Sets the state of the code scanning alert. You must provide `dismissed_reason` when you set the state to `dismissed`.

dismissed_reason.description: **Required when the state is dismissed.** The reason for dismissing or closing the alert.

dismissed_comment.description: The dismissal comment associated with the dismissal of the alert.

create_request.description: If `true`, attempt to create an alert dismissal request.
